entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
